comments: Odd prime p divides a(p-2). For n>1 a(Prime[n]-2)/Prime[n] = A125074(n) = {1, 29, 3343, 407889491, 298572057493, 454195874136455153, ...}. Prime p divides a((p+5)/2) for p = {19, 23, 61}. - _Alexander Adamchuk_, Nov 18 2006
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = (n + e + o(1))n^n. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 12 2012
prog: (PARI) a(n)=(n+1)^n+n^(n+1) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 12 2012(MAGMA)[n^(n+1)+(n+1)^n: n in [0..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 12 2012(Maxima) A051442[n]:=n^(n+1)+(n+1)^n$ makelist(A051442[n],n,0,30); /* _Martin Ettl_, Oct 29 2012 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
